duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive test strategies and test plans for web applications, services, and APIs.
Lead test execution, reporting, and analysis for automation and manual testing efforts.
Conduct database testing and develop SQL queries for data validation.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure effective testing and quality assurance.
Integrate automation efforts into Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical field (Master's preferred)
